ai-mil7.8.2:1.1_0: “Venerable Similarly, what are the two factors for one of these two factors?”
ai-mil7.8.2:1.2_0: “Just as the Suppiyā did, Great King,
ai-mil7.8.2:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator who is engaged in proper attention to the one who lives through proper attention.
ai-mil7.8.2:1.4_0: This is the first thing to get hold of a black cow.
ai-mil7.8.2:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, is drunk on a charming water.
ai-mil7.8.2:2.2_0: In the same way, anyone who practices like a householder, why wouldn’t have arisen in me again have come back? ‘I’m practicing right.’
ai-mil7.8.2:2.3_0: ‘Form is impermanent, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are impermanent.’ You should not this: ‘This is impermanent.’
ai-mil7.8.2:2.4_0: This is the second coal of Kāḷha.
ai-mil7.8.2:2.5_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.8.2:3.2_0: was venerated from the teaching of the noble ones.
